## Vote.get() method

Get a proposal by id.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(proposalId: BigNumberish): Promise<Proposal>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type         | Description             |
| ---------- | ------------ | ----------------------- |
| proposalId | BigNumberish | The proposal id to get. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Proposal](./sdk.proposal.md)&gt;

- The proposal.
